scripts.arkaios:ping: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$envPath='./.env.local'; if(Test-Path $envPath){ Get-Content $envPath | ForEach-Object { if($_ -match '^(.*?)=(.*)$'){ [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable($matches[1], $matches[2]) } } }; $h=@{Authorization='Bearer ' + $env:ARKAIOS_API_KEY}; Invoke-RestMethod -Method GET -Uri ($env:ARKAIOS_BASE_URL + '/debug/ping') -Headers $h | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10"
scripts.arkaios:models: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$envPath='./.env.local'; if(Test-Path $envPath){ Get-Content $envPath | ForEach-Object { if($_ -match '^(.*?)=(.*)$'){ [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable($matches[1], $matches[2]) } } }; $h=@{Authorization='Bearer ' + $env:ARKAIOS_API_KEY}; Invoke-RestMethod -Method GET -Uri ($env:ARKAIOS_BASE_URL + '/v1/models') -Headers $h | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10"
scripts.arkaios:chat:test: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$envPath='./.env.local'; if(Test-Path $envPath){ Get-Content $envPath | ForEach-Object { if($_ -match '^(.*?)=(.*)$'){ [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable($matches[1], $matches[2]) } } }; $h=@{Authorization='Bearer ' + $env:ARKAIOS_API_KEY; 'Content-Type'='application/json'}; $body=@{model=$env:ARKAIOS_MODEL_ID; messages=@(@{role='user'; content='Hola Arkaios'})} | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10; Invoke-RestMethod -Method POST -Uri ($env:ARKAIOS_BASE_URL + '/v1/chat/completions') -Headers $h -Body $body | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10"
scripts.arkaios:auto: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$envPath='./.env.local'; if(Test-Path $envPath){ Get-Content $envPath | ForEach-Object { if($_ -match '^(.*?)=(.*)$'){ [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable($matches[1], $matches[2]) } } }; $local='http://localhost:4000'; $remote='https://arkaios-gateway-open.onrender.com'; $api=$env:ARKAIOS_API_KEY; $headers=@{Authorization='Bearer ' + $api}; function Test-Ping($b){ try { Invoke-RestMethod -Method GET -Uri ($b + '/debug/ping') -Headers $headers -TimeoutSec 8 } catch { $null } }; $base=$local; $ping=Test-Ping $base; if(-not $ping){ $base=$remote; $ping=Test-Ping $base }; Write-Host ('BaseUrl: ' + $base); $models=$null; try { $models=Invoke-RestMethod -Method GET -Uri ($base + '/v1/models') -Headers $headers -TimeoutSec 8 } catch { }; $h=$headers + @{'Content-Type'='application/json'}; $body=@{ model=$env:ARKAIOS_MODEL_ID; messages=@(@{role='user'; content='Genera un componente TSX que imprima Hola Arkaios'}) } | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 10; $chat=$null; try { $chat=Invoke-RestMethod -Method POST -Uri ($base + '/v1/chat/completions') -Headers $h -Body $body -TimeoutSec 20 } catch { }; $okPing=[bool]$ping; $okModels=[bool]$models; $okChat=[bool]$chat; $summary=@{ baseUrl=$base; ping=$okPing; models=$okModels; chat=$okChat }; $json=$summary | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 5; Write-Output $json; if(-not $okPing -and -not $okChat){ exit 1 } else { exit 0 }"
scripts.start:proxy: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "function Get-PidByPort($p){ netstat -ano | findstr (':'+$p) | ForEach-Object { ($_ -split '\s+')[-1] } | Select-Object -Unique }; $pid=Get-PidByPort 4000; if($pid){ try { taskkill /PID $pid /F } catch {} }; $apiKey='sk_arkaios_proxy_8y28hsy72hs82js9'; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:PROXY_API_KEY=$apiKey; $env:ARKAIOS_BASE_URL='https://arkaios-api.onrender.com'; $env:AIDA_BASE_URL='https://aida-gateway.onrender.com'; Start-Process powershell -WindowStyle Minimized -ArgumentList "-NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command cd 'c:/arkaios/arkaios-service-proxy'; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:PROXY_API_KEY='$apiKey'; $env:ARKAIOS_BASE_URL='https://arkaios-api.onrender.com'; $env:AIDA_BASE_URL='https://aida-gateway.onrender.com'; node server.js""
scripts.start:all: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$envPath='./.env.local'; if(Test-Path $envPath){ Get-Content $envPath | ForEach-Object { if($_ -match '^(.*?)=(.*)$'){ [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable($matches[1], $matches[2]) } } }; function Get-PidsByPort($p){ netstat -ano | findstr (':'+$p) | ForEach-Object { ($_ -split '\s+')[-1] } | Select-Object -Unique }; foreach($pid in (Get-PidsByPort 4000)){ try { taskkill /PID $pid /F } catch {} }; foreach($pid in (Get-PidsByPort 3000)){ try { taskkill /PID $pid /F } catch {} }; Start-Process -FilePath powershell -WindowStyle Minimized -ArgumentList "-NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command cd 'c:/arkaios/arkaios-service-proxy'; $env:PORT='4000'; $env:PROXY_API_KEY='$env:ARKAIOS_API_KEY'; $env:ARKAIOS_BASE_URL='https://arkaios-api.onrender.com'; $env:AIDA_BASE_URL='https://aida-gateway.onrender.com'; node server.js"; $headers=@{Authorization='Bearer ' + $env:ARKAIOS_API_KEY}; $ok=$false; for($i=0;$i -lt 15;$i++){ try { $r=Invoke-RestMethod -Method GET -Uri 'http://localhost:4000/debug/ping' -Headers $headers -TimeoutSec 5; if($r){ $ok=$true; break } } catch {}; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2 }; if(-not $ok){ Write-Host 'Proxy no respondió'; exit 1 }; Write-Host 'Proxy OK'; cmd /c npm run arkaios:auto; Start-Process cmd /c "npm run dev" -WorkingDirectory 'c:/arkaios/TRAE-G' ; Write-Host 'Orquestación completa'"
scripts.build:exe: cmd /c "npm run build && (start /B cmd /c npm run preview) && nativefier --name \"TraeG-Arkaios\" --platform windows --arch x64 --portable --out c:\\arkaios\\builds http://localhost:4173/"
scripts.release:exe: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$envPath='./.env.local'; if(Test-Path $envPath){ Get-Content $envPath | ForEach-Object { if($_ -match '^(.*?)=(.*)$'){ [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable($matches[1], $matches[2]) } } }; cmd /c npm run start:all; $ok=$false; for($i=0;$i -lt 20;$i++){ try { $r=Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'http://localhost:3000/' -TimeoutSec 5; if($r.StatusCode -eq 200){ $ok=$true; break } } catch {}; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2 }; if(-not $ok){ Write-Host 'Dev server no respondió en 3000'; exit 1 }; if(-not (Test-Path 'c:/arkaios/builds')){ New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'c:/arkaios/builds' | Out-Null }; nativefier --name 'TraeG-Arkaios' --platform windows --arch x64 --portable --out 'c:/arkaios/builds' 'http://localhost:3000/'"
